subject: Colleges and Universities
Football (College)
Child Abuse and Neglect
Sex Crimes
Suits and Litigation
Children and Childhood
Whistle-Blowers
lead_paragraph: Mike McQueary, the Penn State football assistant whose report that Jerry Sandusky sexually abused a child in the showers led to Joe Paterno’s firing, filed a notice of a lawsuit against the university.
snippet: Mike McQueary, the Penn State football assistant whose report that Jerry Sandusky sexually abused a child in the showers led to Joe Paterno’s firing, filed a notice of a lawsuit against the university.
